title: What to Watch: Around the World in Five Streaming Titles
sub_head: From ‘Around the World in 80 Days’ to season 2 of ‘All the Creatures Great and Small’ here are new series and films to stream this week
body:
New titles and seasons streaming this week take viewers to the barns of the Yorkshire Dales (“All Creatures Great and Small”), a bar on Long Island (“The Tender Bar”) and everywhere in between (“Around the World in 80 Days”). Here’s where to stream them all:
(PBS, PBS.org)
